name: Bootcamp Booster
description: A website designed to build an online community for coding bootcamp students, teachers, developers and those who are interested in joining a bootcamp

name: Mobile Mechanic
description: Project's idea is to allow users to get an estimate of a car maintentance repair and to be able to schedule a technician to get car serviced

name: Donde App
description: A website to comunicate with those around your local area to help each other when disaster strikes

name: News Scraper
description: A web program that allows users to view news headlines and save their preferred ones. It allows users to add notes to saved articles and delete them as they wish

name: Friend Finder
description: This small program allows users to answer a questionnaire and based on the answers match to other users and return a best match.

name: Bamazon
description: A Node command line application that allows customers to buy products from a store named Bamazon. This program allows management to control the quantity of products and to add new products

name: Liri Node App
description: A command line program that allows you to search through Spotify, IMDB movies and bands in town using an api.
